bibl.title: Some Oriental Motifs in Archilochus.
bibl.note: The influence on early Greek poetry of oriental - and more especially Semitic - literary forms and techniques, motifs, and idioms becomes ever more clearly a fact to be reckoned with. Discusses frr. 42, 43, 36-37 and 45 W.2.
bibl.seg: WEST M.L., Some Oriental Motifs in Archilochus.

The influence on early Greek poetry of oriental - and more especially Semitic - literary forms and techniques, motifs, and idioms becomes ever more clearly a fact to be reckoned with. Discusses frr. 42, 43, 36-37 and 45 W.2.
